definition: Mosuo ethnic group of Yunnan and Sichuan
Mosuo ethnic group of Yunnan and Sichuan

sentences.english: Pray for many Mosuo to join Gods family.
sentences.chinese: 願更多的摩梭人能加入上帝的家庭。

sentences.english: Money is now a more powerful force than any of the Mosuo women.
sentences.chinese: 現在金錢的力量比任何摩梭女人都強大。

sentences.english: For better or worse, the unique world of the Mosuo people is changing.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎麼說，摩梭人的獨特世界正在改變。

sentences.english: People living here say the matriarchal system helps reduce conflicts inside their community.
sentences.chinese: 摩梭人說，母系氏族制度有利於減少社會衝突。

sentences.english: Chapter five: The technology of Mosuo people in the plateau of the Northwest of Yunnan province.
sentences.chinese: 第五章，滇西北高原摩梭人住居的建築技術體系。

sentences.english: Hot springs, funeral of Daba, mysterious Muosuo.
sentences.chinese: 溫泉，達巴的葬禮，神祕的摩梭文字。

sentences.english: Mosuo people do not formally marry. Rather, they carry a special 'walking marriage' custom.
sentences.chinese: 摩梭人不正式結婚，而是實行走婚的習俗。

sentences.english: A generation ago, few outsiders had ever heard of Lake Lugu or the Mosuo.
sentences.chinese: 在上一代，少有外地人聽說過瀘沽湖或摩梭族。

definition: Mosuo ethnic group of Yunnan and Sichuan
Wa, Kawa or Va ethnic group of Myanmar, south China and southeast Asia
Blang people, one of the 56 ethnic groups officially recognized by the PRC
Hmong or Miao ethnic group of southwest China
